website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOwalk 5 - Qualify is popular with shoppers for several reasons. First, the Ultra Go cushioning makes users feel like they’re walking on air. Second, the Comfort Pillar Technology enhances the responsiveness and shock absorption of the outsole. On top of that, it also looks good.Though the Air Cooled Goga Mat insole feels slippery to some, it did help prevent warm and sweaty feet. Overall, it comes highly recommended by owners.
pros: Numerous owners of the GOwalk 5 - Qualify bought extra pairs because it is that comfortable
The breathability in this product pleases a good number of wearers
A bunch of reviewers believes this pair of Skechers walking shoes to be durable
The sporty style of this product appeals to a lot of people
Plenty of buyers enjoy traveling on foot because this footwear feels so light
cons: The upper of this walking shoe feels too soft for some folks that it fails to properly contain their feet
A few individuals are unhappy with the insole as it makes their foot slide forwards, which, in turn, hurts their toes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes this is my second pair, had various Skechers styles in the past but this style is by far my favourite, wanted a shoe for walking the dog regularly that would not wear down on the soles as quick as previous shoes and these ones last on the sole far longer, still have my first pair in this style after 18 months and there is still a few miles wear left on the soles. Purchased this second pair ready to replace when the first pair finally wear out. Price is competitive as I knew the size I needed fit is perfect. All in all a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoes for my husband who is having pain when he walks but with this shoes is really very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kartheeka Kalluri

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great as always just love these sketches shoes for my partner, his old scratches needed replacing he is delighted with his new one and a great fit
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 5 star, excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfortable trainers, cannot fault Sketchers. I bought these for a friend who was and is thrilled with them, says they feel like slippers. Light and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Green

customer_reviews.title: Superb comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really struggle to get comfortable shoes that I can wear all day and these are perfect, so very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Good service, quick delivery and, as is often the case with Skechers, comfortable straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early very well wrapped, look really comfy and well made. Perfect for going long walks on.
customer_reviews.author: L.Benton

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, very comfortable. This is my second pair and I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: real comfort shoes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before time, I love Sketchers I am a size 8 1/2 but chose size 8 which were a perfect fit even with insoles in
customer_reviews.author: medagusto

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in non original packaging due to damage in transit. Shoes are fine. Can't try them on yet due to swollen foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: the fit
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit and comfort and the light feel as you walk.
customer_reviews.author: muriel shelton

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair if Skechers. Had previously bought a pair of 'Go Walks' for my wife who always said how comfortable they were. Having had them only a short while I can safely say these are amazingly comfortable and a really good fit. I'm a UK size 10 and they fit perfectly. Will definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Clay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit wide but not overly so. Nice and comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Sven smith

customer_reviews.title: Good footwear
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable well made and good for 1000 miles of walking
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter Busfield

customer_reviews.title: fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: really satisfied with the fit, comfort and quality. Ideal for long walks/treks.
customer_reviews.author: john mullen

customer_reviews.title: Bestbuy yet
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect liked the extra support a joy to wear
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Go walk 5
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 fitted perfectly and there really light. Comfortable is an understatement. Will be getting some more.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but fault has occurred
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes; but a wear spot has appeared. Would it be possible to replace please?
customer_reviews.author: kevin mellor

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Walk 5 Qualify Trainers
product_meta.description: The leaders in walking shoe technology continue to innovative with the Skechers GO Walk 5™ - qualify. Features lightweight, responsive ultra go™ cushioning and high-rebound comfort pillar technology; for the ultimate in walking comfort. Soft.
feature_bullets: High-Rebound Comfort Pillar Technology Underfoot React To Your Every Step For The Ultimate Comfort
Air Cooled Goga Mat Technology Insole For High-Rebound Cushioning And Comfort
Dual Density Outsole For Added Stability And Support
Machine Washable Shoe Design - Wash On Gentle Cycle Cold, Hang To Air Dry
